code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import'./blog.css';import BlogCard from'../components/BlogCard.jsx';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Blog=()=>{const[blogs,setBlogs]=useState([]);const fetchData=()=>{fetch('http://localhost:3000/data/blogData.json').then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>{setBlogs(data);}).catch(e=>console.log(e.message));};useEffect(()=>{fetchData();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"blogs",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container-fluid",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{className:"section-title",children:"Our Blog"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row mt-5",children:blogs&&blogs.length>0&&blogs.map(blogs=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BlogCard,{blog:blogs},blogs._id))})]})});};export default Blog;
